snippet: Rudy Kurniawan, a wine collector charged with selling millions in counterfeit bottles, was known for his expensive tastes and for his ability to spot forgeries.
abstract: Eric Asimov The Pour column on the arrest of Rudy Kurniawan, a wine collector known as an authority on fraudulent wines, charged by federal authorities with selling millions of dollars' worth of counterfeit bottles.

byline.contributor: Colin Moynihan and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Rudy Kurniawan, a wine collector charged with selling millions in counterfeit bottles, was known for his expensive tastes and for his ability to spot forgeries.

headline.print_headline: Doubts Grew Slowly Over a Palate Above Suspicion
headline.seo: Doubts Grew Slowly About Wine Collector Charged with Fraud
headline.main: Doubts Grew Slowly Over a Palate Above Suspicion
